chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Lord Nasin Caeren, p. 62 (59)—Andoran noble, High Seat of House Caeren. He gave Arymilla lodging during her attempts to take the Lion Throne. He has thin white hair, and is stark raving mad. He believes himself betrothed to Elenia, despite the fact that she is married. See also Caeren, Miedelle.
